fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.genealgorithms.section

Class LineGaussianSmoothing

  • Object
    • LineGaussianSmoothing

  • public class LineGaussianSmoothing
extends Object
    Computation of a the coalescence algorithm on a linear SectionAgent THIS ALGO SHOULD NOT BE USED ANYMORE => USE THE GAUSSIAN FILTER OF GEOXYGENE INSTEAD
    Author:
    jGaffuri 09/07/2007 (updated J. Renard 22/04/2010)
